title: Kairos
description: My personal gaming and workstation PC running Gentoo Linux.
details:
System specifications:

  • AMD Ryzen 9 5950X (16-core/32-thread)
  • 64GB DDR4-3600 RAM
  • NVIDIA RTX 3080 with CUDA support
  • 2TB NVMe SSD + 8TB storage array
  • Custom water cooling loop
  • Gentoo Linux with custom kernel optimizations

This build serves as both a high-performance gaming rig and a development workstation, with the flexibility of Gentoo Linux allowing for precise system customization.
